mapper.select: SELECT NVL(store_tel,'없음')as"STORE_TEL",store_addr,store_name, NVL(store_business,'없음')as"STORE_BUSINESS", NVL(store_introduce,'없음')as"STORE_INTRODUCE", store_score,store_hit,store_img, NVL(store_homepage,'없음')as"STORE_HOMEPAGE", NVL(store_price,'없음')as"STORE_PRICE",store_no FROM store WHERE store_no = #{store_no}

SELECT store_score, store_no,store_img, nvl(store_price,'가격정보 없음')as "STORE_PRICE", store_name,store_addr,store_hit,store_business FROM (select * from store
WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(store_name,#{searchWord}) OR REGEXP_LIKE(store_keyword,#{searchWord})
ORDER BY store_hit desc) WHERE rownum <= 8 AND store_business like '%'||#{store_business}||'%'
AND store_price = #{store_price}

SELECT rownum,store_score, store_no,store_img, nvl(store_price,'가격정보 없음')as "STORE_PRICE", store_name,store_addr,store_hit,store_business FROM (select * from store
WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(store_name,#{searchWord}) OR REGEXP_LIKE(store_keyword,#{searchWord})
ORDER BY store_score desc)
AND store_business like '%'||#{store_business}||'%'
AND store_price = #{store_price}
AND store_business like '%'||#{store_business}||'%'
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET store_score = round(((store_score*store_score_count)+#{setStore_score})/(1+store_score_count),1) ,store_score_count = store_score_count+1 ,store_hit = store_hit -1 WHERE store_no = #{store_no}
mapper.select: select * from (select RANK() OVER (ORDER BY store_hit DESC )"랭크", store_name,store_img,store_price,store_hit from store) where "랭크" <= 2
SELECT count(*) total FROM store WHERE gubun = #{gubun}
